desc: The Beaufort Theatre & Café Bar is the premier destination for entertainment in Blaenau Gwent. Situated at the top of the Ebbw Valley, The Beaufort Theatre & Café Bar looks out across the community that we serve

layout.text: The Beaufort Theatre & Café Bar is the premier destination for entertainment in Blaenau Gwent. Situated at the top of the Ebbw Valley, The Beaufort Theatre & Café Bar looks out across the community that it serves.
